snippet: Rose, the final position player from the team’s Big Red Machine days of the 1970s to join the Hall, is this year’s only inductee and will be honored in June.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Pete Rose will enter Cincinnati Reds Hall of Fame weeks after Major League Baseball declined to reinstate him, preventing his induction into Baseball Hall of Fame; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rose, the final position player from the team’s Big Red Machine days of the 1970s to join the Hall, is this year’s only inductee and will be honored in June.

headline.print_headline: Reds’ Hall of Fame Will Induct Pete Rose
headline.main: Reds’ Hall of Fame Will Induct Pete Rose
